CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Phone__c)), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Email__c)), 2, 1 ) + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Secondary_Phone__c)), 1, 0) + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Secondary_Email__c)), 1, 0) + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Organization_Name__c)), 1, 0) + /* Check that Occupation is not blank AND not the "None" value */ IF(NOT(ISPICKVAL(Occupation__c, "")), 1, 0) + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Address__c)), 1, 0) + IF(NOT(ISPICKVAL(Budget__c, "")), 1, 0) + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(First_Site_Visit_Date_Time__c)), 1, 0) + IF(NOT(ISPICKVAL(How_soon_do_you_intend_to_buy_it__c, "")), 1, 0) + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(No_of_Site_Visit__c)) && No_of_Site_Visit__c > 0, 1, 0), 0 )
CustomField.label: Lead Score
